description: '''Tone Dogs''' was an [[Avant-garde progressive rock|avant-prog]] group founded in 1987 by bassist [[Fred Chalenor]] and vocalist/saxophonist [[Amy Denio]], who comprised the nucleus of the band. Drummer [[Matt Cameron]], known for his work in the [[alternative rock]] group [[Soundgarden]], was recruited to perform on the band's 1990 debut album ''[[Ankety Low Day]]''. The band has also performed with [[Fred Frith]] of [[Henry Cow]] and [[Hans Reichel]].
